item.title: Need Help Whit MegaScape Source!
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

for the start message go into client.java press Ctrl+F, you should see a menu, type “welcome to megascape” click next untill you see the startmessage, now you can change it to what ever you would like,

to make you admin press CTRL+F, and type in “start of mod”
you should see


 //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME"))
				{
					playerRights = 3; 
				}

now type yourname to replace YOURNAME, and keep the playerrights at 3, after that save it, compile and run server, when ever your playerrights are 3 you wont be able to see your crown, but u will be an admin, if your not sure if your admin type “::pickup 0995 1” and see if you pick something up

Read full topic
